answerText: DNA gel electrophoresis[10] After a gel is run, it is commonly soaked in a solution of this compound, which intercalates DNA and makes the fragments fluoresce with a bright orange color when placed under UV light.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Rice A + Columbia A | 2 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A garose gel is a common medium used in this technique. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this technique that uses an electric field to separate DNA molecules by size.
